release.action: Extend conversion between amount types. Handle conversions in from(TemporalAmount) using Temporals.convertAmount(...). Fixes #7.
Add Temporals.convertAmount(...). Allows an amount in one unit to be converted to an amount in a different unit. Fixes #6.
Add Months.ofYears(int). Support weeks in Months.from(TemporalAmount). Support weeks in Months.parse(CharSequence). Fixes #5.
Add Days.ofWeeks(int). Support weeks in Days.from(TemporalAmount). Support weeks in Days.parse(CharSequence). Fixes #4.
